    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Canvia de cara</string>
            <string language="en">Changing face</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderndes Gesicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visage changeant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cara em mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia cambiante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταβαλλόμενο πρόσωπο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Configuració d'una cara humana amb tots els elements que la conformen (ulls, nas, boca, celles, cabells) seguint les pautes que s'hi expliciten.</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing a human face with all its attributes (eyes, nose, mouth, eyebrows, hair) according to the guidelines given.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">joc</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
            <string language="es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió lectora</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein menschliches Gesicht mit allen seinen 
Attributen (Augen, Wekzeugspritze, Öffnung, Augenbrauen, Haar) 
entsprechend den Korrekturlinien zeichnen gegeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessinant un visage humain avec tous ses 
attributs (yeux, nez, bouche, sourcils, cheveux) selon les directives 
données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhando uma cara humana com todos seus 
atributos (olhos, nariz, boca, sobrancelhas, cabelo) de acordo com os 
guidelines dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipando una faccia umana con tutti gli 
relativi attributi (occhi, naso, bocca, sopracciglia, capelli) secondo
la guida di riferimento data.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύροντας ένα ανθρώπινο πρόσωπο με όλες τις 
ιδιότητές του (μάτια, μύτη, στόμα, φρύδια, τρίχα) σύμφωνα με 
τις οδηγίες που δίνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
